bug.author: byronyi
bug.summary: 38c9b12 stucks gdr in ResNet50_v1.5 official benchmark
bug.description: With <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/38c9b12464b23aac132fbc8005cb74de86eee241>38c9b12</denchmark-link> , grpc+gdr server protocol gets stuck in ResNet50_v1.5 official benchmark. This issue is a marker to other users of GDR. Hopefully I could find some time to fix it next week.
